Welcome to the Assessment Center Computerized Adaptive Test (CAT)\n\nPlease select the CATs you would like to complete and then click the Start button. Each CAT takes 1–2 minutes to answer all the questions and get your report.

Enter you Email and Phone Number

My IMC App is part of our commitment to the community to pioneer a unique approach of healing the body, mind and soul by applying the best global healthcare standards and pursuing divine ethics. We strive to provide a seamless patient experience using convenient channels for our visitors and patients, providing them with secure access to digital healthcare anywhere and anytime without the need to visit our healthcare facilities.

My IMC is designed to serve our patients by giving them a full overview of their health situation (medical records, medications and allergies).

My IMC App features include:

  • Book/reschedule/cancel appointments.
  • View and download test results.
  • View prescribed medication.
  • View and download health summaries.
  • Find a doctor.
  • Access exclusive health tips from our partner the Mayo Clinic Care Network.
  • Learn more about IMC clinics and departments.
  • Receive helpful reminders.
  • Call us directly or request a callback for our services.
  • Get directions to our healthcare facilities.

International Medical Center (IMC) will add regular updates to the My IMC App, aiming to build one of the most useful, interactive and innovative services globally.

To provide suggestions or feedback on the App, please get in touch with our contact center at +966 920 027 778 or send an email at patientportal@imc.med.sa.

Please stay tuned for upcoming features. May you and your loved ones continue to enjoy the blessing of health.
I certify that I am NOT experiencing any of the above health conditions/symptoms.
I the patient/parent/guardian, hereby consent to the participation of care and treatment under IMC Telehealth.
Note: IMC will not be liable in case information is not correctly provided by the patient.

While our doctors are able to treat the top issues you would go see a doctor about, there are conditions that we don’t treat. Please see an in-person doctor or hospital if you experience any of the following:

  • Traumatic brain or spinal cord injury
  • Chest pain and/or numbness
  • Vomiting or coughing blood
  • Lacerations
  • Loss of consciousness
  • Broken bones
  • Severe burns
  • Acute vision loss
  • Chest Pain
  • Altered mental status
  • Blood in stool
  • homicidal or suicidal thoughts
  • Drug overdose

Our doctors are unable to write prescriptions for controlled substances. Please see a doctor in person if you require medication classified as a controlled substance.
Please confirm that you are in the hospital for your consultation with requested doctor.

Appointment scheduling by phone is available from 7:00AM to 7:00PM on weekdays. Alternatively, complete our online form and receive a callback to confirm your appointment.


The Emergency Department operates 24 hours a day, seven days a week, 365 days a year.

Terms and Conditions

These terms and conditions establish and control use of our website whereas by using this website you acknowledge full acceptance of all these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to the terms or any part thereof you should refrain from using our website.

1. Use of Website


The website has been prepared basically to facilitate possibility of obtaining healthcare services and information rendered by the center.The website is intended solely for your personal use.

2. Absence of Guarantees


2.1 We do not guarantee, acknowledge or undertake any of the following:

2.2 The website shall meet your needs or function without interruption or in a disciplined manner or safe or without errors or viruses.

2.3 The website shall meet your needs or function without interruption or in a disciplined manner or safe or without errors or viruses.

2.4 The description of content or photographs or video clips available in the website are accurate with regard to healthcare services rendered by the center.

3. Conditions for Appointment Booking


3.1 The website can not be used to make false or fraudulent appointment booking. Moreover, you guarantee, acknowledge and undertake that all the information given on yourself or any other person are correct and accurate at the time of making the appointment booking.

3.2 Appointments can only be booked via the website for selected IMC clinics determined at our absolute discretion.

3.3 For IMC clinics that are not allowed for making website appointment booking, appointment shall be made by phone or personal attendance.

3.4 To make a website appointment booking you must have a medical record (file) that already exists in the hospital.

3.5 Upon using the website you have the right only to:

  • Make an appointment in an IMC clinic in which you have been registered as a patient.
  • Make a maximum of three appointments on the same day.
  • Make one appointment in a single clinic

    • 3.6 We reserve the right to deprive you from using the website appointment booking feature for any period as determined at our absolute discretion in the following conditions:

  • Failure to attend any appointment made through the website.
  • If we decide to do so at our absolute discretion for any reason.

    • 4. Prohibited Uses


    4.1 You have no right to use the website in a way that may cause harm to or overloads our servers Or any network connected to any of our servers. Furthermore, you may not use the website in any way that may conflict with the use of any other party to the website or any way that is likely to be in violation of the regulations in force or harm the rights of any party or result in legal entitlements in accordance of any of the applicable regulations.

    4.2 You may not misuse the website by way of deliberately leading to entry of viruses or Sub Seven Trojan or malicious or technically harmful substances. Also you have no right to try to use unauthorized access to the website or host server in which the website is stored or any other server or computer or connected to the website database. Also you may not attack the website by using programs intended to cut the service.

    4.3 We will inform the law enforcement authorities of any violation to item 5-3 by disclosing your identity and in the event of occurrence of such violation you will immediately be denied the right to use the website.

    4.4 Accordingly, you agree not to do any of the following whether by yourself or through a third party:

  • Use any Robots, search engine spiders, screen scanners, data collection tools, any other automatic equipment or processes for processing, monitoring , photocopying the website or any information or content or data therein or may be obtained via the website without our written prior approval.
  • Use of any automatic processes to collect or merge information or content or data available or reachable via the website with the information or content or data that can be reached or obtained via any third party.
  • Use of any automatic process to overlap or attempt to overlap the work of the website.
  • Take any action that puts illogical or inappropriate huge load on the website infrastructures or the bandwidth connected to the website.
  • To do a reverse engineering or reverse assembly or dismantling or attempt by any means to detect the source code or any algorithm equation or other processes pertaining to basic software infrastructure and the processes related to the website.
  • To copy or reproduce or change or amend or create derivatives of any part or content obtained from the website or its public presentation without obtaining our prior written approval.

    • 5. Access


    5.1 You are using the website at your personal responsibility.

    5.2 You may not get access to the website by use of equipment or services designed to provide recurrent high speed automatic access.

    5.3 Specific parts in the website are protected by passwords or require to log in. Therefore, you are prohibited from accessing or attempting to gain unauthorized access to these parts or to any materials or other protected information we deliberately made unavailable to be used for this purpose.

    5.4 In order to be able to use the website you have to:

  • Enter your identification data (Saudi ID number or Medical record Number).
  • Enter your personal identification number usable once and will be sent to you by SMS message.

    • 5.5 By using the website you acknowledge, undertake and ensure that:

  • You have fulfilled the minimum age requirement.
  • You have provided complete, correct registration information which you will continue to update immediately. You authorize us to implement all the instructions and transaction on your behalf with regard to your use of websites.
  • Your use of the website does not violate these terms and conditions of use or any applicable regulations.

    • 5.6 We reserve the right to:

  • Reject or cancel your request to get access to the website for any reason at our discretion or freeze possibility to access the website.
  • Utilize your information registered in our records for analysis reason without obtaining your prior approval according to these terms and conditions of use.

    • 5.7 To enable you to use the website you have to connect to the internet and you will solely bear the internet connection fees and any other service - related fees and fees for provision of all necessary equipment for internet connection including a computer set, modem or any other equipment that has the ability to connect.

    6. Password Security & its notifications


    6.1 You shall solely bear responsibility for all activities related to registration details of your access to the website and therefore you have to take all the necessary steps to ensure confidentiality of registration details of you access to the website.

    6.2 You have to report to us immediately as soon as you know about disclosure, loss, stealing or unauthorized use of your access registration details.

    7. Electronic Links to Websites


    The web design framework may not be copied and placed in another website and you may not create a link connecting to any part of our website other than the main page. Furthermore we reserve our right to withdraw the website connection permission without nee to send you a prior notification in that matter.

    8. Determination of Liability


    8.1 Taking into account any responsibilities provided for by regulation which can not be exempted or disavowed, none of our managers, staff or clients shall bear responsibility towards you for any losses, compensations, responsibility, claims or expenses (including for example but not limited to legal or defense expenses in front of legal authorities or settlement expenses) of any kind whether direct or indirect or subordination resulting from or any foreign matter or foreign companies or on your access to the website whether that responsibility is contractual , relates to negligence, violation of legal duty or other. Beyond doubt, we shall not bear any responsibility for any shortage, incompleteness, not available or any delay attributable or accompanying any sort of data mentioned in item 5-4.

    8.2 We shall not bear responsibility towards you or any other body for any loss resulting from a reason beyond our control which includes electronic or mechanical breakdown of equipment or communication lines or unauthorized access or viruses or theft or operator\'s mistakes or bad weather or unusual weather conditions (including floods, earthquake, or other of fate and destiny) or fires or wars or cases of armed rebellion or terrorist attacks or riots or labor disputes or any other problems related to workers or accidents or emergency cases or delays or excessive bookings exceeding the limit or cancellations or transfer of power or any action taken by the government.

    9. Website Availability


    9.1 Whereas website services are susceptible to interruption or breakdown the availability of access to the website shall be provided as it is available just no other.

    9.2 We may according to our absolute estimation enforce limits on your use of the website, we may also for security, technical, legal, legislative reasons or for reasons related to maintenance or due to any violation of terms of use withdraw the website or block your access at any time without need to provide any notification.

    10. Privacy


    10.1 Your privacy and security are very important to us and we are accountable for respecting your privacy at any legal authority vested on us. Furthermore, we are committed to all our obligations provided for in relevant data protection laws in force including legal provisions applicable in Saudi Arabia. Your approval of terms of use is considered to be an explicit consent to use the data as indicated in the terms and conditions of use of website.

    10.2 We may collect processing data and retain the following information about you:

  • Information that can identify your identity which was provided to us at time of your registration to obtain our services or those information collected via your use of the website.
  • Information you consider to be personal and sensitive that relate to your health condition which may include:
  • Information on your personal health including your medical history.
  • Information on any disabilities you have suffered or still suffer from.
  • Information on any healthcare provided or continue to be provide to you.
  • Information on you relating to any of your organ or substance from your body donated or derived from any tests or checkups done for any part or substance of your body.
  • Information relating to you that was collected before or during provision of any health care to you.

    • 10.3 We are using your personal information only when necessary in a way that enables us to provide service to you or to implement the processes you have requested or operate the website. We may use these personal information for the following purposes:

  • Tracing data traffic patterns from ant to the website ( which may include retention of details relating to your own Internet Protocol Address\'s IPs or the operating system or browser or range or information on any other user ( such as your user name, for example).
  • Simplify logging in of your personal information in some Analyze online models and enable you to log in and obtain some website information.
  • Analyze patient medical records including for example but not limited to diagnosis, medical prescriptions, laboratory test results etc.

    • 10.4 We will not disclose any personal information to any third party except within cases provided for in the terms of use or within legally allowed limits or authorized by a competent court.

    10.5 The website will record and track your use of the website via many tracking tools such as the (Cookies) and other monitoring devices. You may choose to disable the cookies in your browser or delete it from the hard drive as you do not need to operate the cookies to use the website but you will need it to access and use some website sites or reach any dedicated or secure content on the website. Some website pages may not work properly if the cookies are not operated.

    10.6 We are using sensitive personal information to make sure that we can provide you with the services you have requested which are delivered by IMC in the best way we can. We will use the sensitive personal information to help provide you with information about your health or your medical records.

    10.7 We, on our part, will not disclose any of your sensitive personal information to any other party apart from those referred to in item 10-8 except in the following cases:

  • If we obtain an explicit written approval from you (or your designee) which we may request from you from time to time.
  • If it is necessary to protect your health and safety or health and safety of another person (or a group of other persons) including in emergency cases or for protection of public health and safety.
  • If the disclosure of such information is done to one of the professional healthcare practitioners in order to ensure provision and promotion of any medical treatment provided in a timely manner or any health services or for provision of medication.
  • If the disclosure of the information is done in accordance with common customary and accepted practices.
  • If these information are known to others as legally disclosed by you or your designee.
  • If we are required by law, regulation or any competent court.

    • 10.8 We may share the information you provided to us with our partners and we, any of our partners or any of our subordinates may use the information provided to us for the following reasons:

  • To ensure that the website content is delivered in the most effective manner for you and the device you are using to access the website.
  • To facilitate or improve the website performance and the services made available to you.
  • Provide you with the information and services as requested by you or we consider may interest you.
  • Inform you of any changes in the website or our services where applicable.
  • Analyze website performance.
  • Analyze patient medical records.

    • 10.9 We may share your information in the form of anonymous data with third parties through which individuals can not be identified for research, statistics or study epidemiological characteristics according to legal requirements / or regulations or decisions of competent courts.

    11. Website and Trademark Rights


    11.1 All intellectual property rights are owned by us or entities licensed by us.

    11.2 The trademark is exclusively owned by us or entities licensed by us.

    11.3 You may not use the trademark except after obtaining our express written consent.

    11.4 You may not reproduce or store any part of the website in any electronic system or any other retrieval system or amend, configure, load in sites owned by third parties or reproduce its frame design or presented to the public or transform it into any other form through any process whatsoever without obtaining our specific prior written consent with the exception of as necessary for personal presentation of the website via your own web browser or what follows or as permitted by current terms of use or under the applicable regulations.

    12. Termination


    12.1 We terminate your use or access to the websites with or without reason at any time whether with or without notification without any liability to you.

    12.2 The terms and conditions relating to limitations and discharge and exemption from liability shall remain valid after any termination and in case of termination you are prohibited from accessing and using the website directly or indirectly.

    12.3 Any violation of the items may result immediately in suspension of you use and accessing the websites.

    13. General Provisions


    13.1 The websites and the disputes arising therefrom shall subject to the regulations in force in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia taking into account your obligations provided for in the regulations applicable in the country of your residence and accordingly you acknowledge your final and definitively irrevocable submission to the jurisdiction of the Saudi Arabian Courts.

    13.2 We may implement any of our obligations and use any of the rights granted to us subject to said terms of use through any third party. Also we may waiver in whole or in part our rights and obligations provided for in these terms and conditions of use to any third party.

    13.3 If it is ascertained that any item of the terms of use or any part thereof is void or unenforceable or not valid it shall be separated from these terms of use and the rest of the terms shall remain valid and enforceable with the whole of its effect provided that such separation shall not change the basic nature of these terms of use.

    13.4 No any of our phrase or phrases or behavior may be construed as a waiver on our part of any right and shall not be considered as a relinquishment of the right.

This Consent of the data subject means you are granting a user to access your all information including appointments, reports and personal information. When Guardian MR Number user logins into My IMC then he/she will be able to see your MR Number in dependent list and can switch to your MR Number. By switching MR Number your all detail will be accessible.

By adding and linking guardian below operations can be done by guardian:

  • View all appointments
  • View all reports.
  • View Allergies.
  • View Medication.
  • View profile information.
  • Request an appointment.
  • Cancel and reschedule appointment.

Note: You can Link/Unlink or Remove guardian any time.

 

By accepting this consent you are granting access to guardian to operate your records.
